rules_text:
You gain 5 life and draw a card. Then if you've cast spells named When the Stars Align five times this game, you win the game.
[i]Augmented[/i] – If you've spent {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} to cast spells this turn, you may shuffle When the Stars Align into your library.
notes:
When The Stars Align — Lindsey Stirling
Alt Wincon/Build Around
!done 

See if you want to do anything to it — DB
